content: identify the st you will use in row below bring your hook to st sts stitch stitches the back of your work yo insert hook back to front right to left skip skip around the front of the post of the identified st yo pull up a loop treble_crochet treble_crochet complete the double_crochet as usual yo pull through 2 loops yo pull through the final 2 loops fpdc front post double_crochet bpdc back post double_crochet this pattern has been tech edited and tested yarn creature © 2023 yarncreature com p e b b l e r i d g e a c r o c h e t p l a c e m a t p a t t e r n b y y a r n c r e a t u r e pattern one placemat main body with color a fsc 45 chain 1 turn row 1 single_crochet double_crochet into first st *skip 1 single_crochet double_crochet in next st repeat from * to last two sts skip 1 1 single_crochet in last st chain 1 turn 45 sts row 2-32 repeat row 1 row 33 single_crochet double_crochet in first st *skip 1 single_crochet double_crochet in next st repeat from * to last two sts skip 1 1 single_crochet in last st do not turn your work do not break yarn border round 1 chain 3 this will serve as center treble_crochet st for the corner 2 double_crochet in same space make 31 evenly spaced double_crochet along the side edge to corner so that the fabric continues to lie flat 2 double_crochet 1 treble_crochet 2 double_crochet in corner st 45 double_crochet across bottom edge to corner continue in this manner around the placemat to beg chain-3 work 2 double_crochet in same space as beg chain-3 to complete the corner join with slip_stitch at the top of beg chain-3 to com- plete the round cut yarn and pull the loop through with color b round 2 join new yarn in any double_crochet after a treble_crochet from round 1 and chain 1 counts as single_crochet 1 single_crochet in each double_crochet 5 single_crochet in each of the four corner treble_crochet slip_stitch into beg chain to complete the round round 3 chain 3 counts as beg double_crochet in first bdst complete bdst around beg chain-3 *skip 1 bdst* repeat from * to corner skip 1 bdst chain 2 bdst in the third single_crochet st of the corner continue in this manner around the entire placemat slip_stitch into top of beg chain-3 to complete the round round 4 chain 1 counts as single_crochet single_crochet in every st to corner 3 single_crochet in chain-2 space continue in this manner around slip_stitch into beg chain to complete the round round 5 chain 2 *fpdc bpdc repeat from * to corner fpdc bpdc around each of the 3 corner single_crochet from previous row continue in this manner around slip_stitch into top of chain-2 to complete the round cut yarn and pull the loop through
